alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 9:00PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: A surface low remains along the NE Gulf Coast this evening bringing bands of moderate to heavy snow at times over the panhandle. The bulk of precipitation has moved SE of Yakutat and now blankets the Central and Southern Panhandle. As the low continues to shift S along the coast, an enhanced band of heavier snow will develop over the Central Panhandle and move S through late tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka, Admiralty Island and Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island including Angoon, Kake, and Port Alexander. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to reduced visibility and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest rates are expected through Friday night. Some mixing with rain is likely near Port Alexander Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
